name: Youma Kourin
overview: Once upon a time, in the Edo era (1603-1868), one girl received marriage proposals from three different men. The girl thought about their proposals for a long time and the men left ... Then the girl was kidnapped by a flock of demons and devils. The girl’s father asked the three men to save her. Men responded to the request and only the bravest will reach victory and be able to save the girl from the clutches of demons. In the hope that then the girl will open his heart to him.
